mapper.sql: a.oid AS "oid", a.sys_oid AS "sysOid", a.shop_name AS "shopName", a.shop_id AS "shopId", a.sku_id AS "skuId", a.paytime AS "paytime", a.brand AS "brand", a.goods_nbr AS "goodsNbr", a.goods_size AS "goodsSize", a.sys_order_time AS "sysOrderTime", a.sys_send_time AS "sysSendTime", a.num AS "num", a.price AS "price", a.payment AS "payment", a.cust_name AS "custName", a.ems_comp AS "emsComp", a.ems_price AS "emsPrice", a.channel_name AS "channelName", a.channel_id AS "channelId", a.kefu_name AS "kefuName", a.discount_fee AS "discountFee", a.promotion_info AS "promotionInfo", a.sys_order_price AS "sysOrderPrice", a.sys_post_name AS "sysPostName", a.sys_post_fee AS "sysPostFee", a.profits AS "profits", a.tip AS "tip"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_tmail_finance_report( oid, sys_oid, shop_name, shop_id, sku_id, paytime, brand, goods_nbr, goods_size, sys_order_time, sys_send_time, num, price, payment, cust_name, ems_comp, ems_price, channel_name, channel_id, kefu_name, discount_fee, promotion_info, sys_order_price, sys_post_name, sys_post_fee, profits, tip ) VALUES ( #{oid}, #{sysOid}, #{shopName}, #{shopId}, #{skuId}, #{paytime}, #{brand}, #{goodsNbr}, #{goodsSize}, #{sysOrderTime}, #{sysSendTime}, #{num}, #{price}, #{payment}, #{custName}, #{emsComp}, #{emsPrice}, #{channelName}, #{channelId}, #{kefuName}, #{discountFee}, #{promotionInfo}, #{sysOrderPrice}, #{sysPostName}, #{sysPostFee}, #{profits}, #{tip} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_tmail_finance_report SET oid = #{oid}, sys_oid = #{sysOid}, shop_name = #{shopName}, shop_id = #{shopId}, sku_id = #{skuId}, paytime = #{paytime}, brand = #{brand}, goods_nbr = #{goodsNbr}, goods_size = #{goodsSize}, sys_order_time = #{sysOrderTime}, sys_send_time = #{sysSendTime}, num = #{num}, price = #{price}, payment = #{payment}, cust_name = #{custName}, ems_comp = #{emsComp}, ems_price = #{emsPrice}, channel_name = #{channelName}, channel_id = #{channelId}, kefu_name = #{kefuName}, discount_fee = #{discountFee}, promotion_info = #{promotionInfo}, sys_order_price = #{sysOrderPrice}, sys_post_name = #{sysPostName}, sys_post_fee = #{sysPostFee}, profits = #{profits}, tip = #{tip} WHERE id = #{id}
